name: cc-py-toolkit
description: AI-enhanced SAP HCM Payroll implementation toolkit, battle-tested to 100% validation across 50 companies in 20 industries with 7 approach combinations. Document-driven pipeline with approach-driven architecture: questionnaire captures 5 implementation toggles (Time Management, Benefits, OM Scope, Go-Live Timing, Concurrent Employment) that cascade through funcspec, config workbook, and migration file. Includes deterministic gen_helpers.py generation library encoding all 51 validated error fixes. Produces 21-tab config workbooks and 18-23 sheet migration files with full BSI geocode mapping. Iterative testing framework included: 50-company test harness, v3 validator (44+ checks), wave runner, and error registry.
